Installed FreeArc, installed Game for Windows Live, ran this installer from Globe and launched the game. Runs fantastic, nothing seems ripped, videos for cutscenes have been resampled to lower quality but are still watchable. Haven't played with saving yet, just played the first level and hopped on here to share that it DOES work! Final extracted size is only about 4.5GB too for anyone wondering.

Also, Globe has an alternative EXE on his blog for anyone who doesn't want to watch the Razor intro tacked onto the included loader when they launch the game.

I'm over halfway into it, and can confirm what Nickhamm has said. Cutscenes are watchable although downgraded. Also I think that the MP component has been flat out removed, as it cannot launch and the entire data included in the RIP is under a folder named SP.  (Apologies if I've missed the mark on this one). Seeing as it's a peer to peer MP anyways, no loss here for pirates.

Saving has worked perfectly and I'm even accumulating achievements on my offline account, I wonder what'll happen when my account tries to sync with the server.

Thanks for the RIP and purchase the game if you enjoy it. I know I will :)
